title: 3 years = Three years
brief_description: For Calvin, joining up with Green Corps when he was 20 proved to be a turning point in his life. Motivated and inspired by the people he met in Green Corps, three years on, he is now successfully employed, confident and making the most of every opportunity that comes his way.
